name: Kitty Cat Squash!
description:
Note this game is in-development
___________________________________________

Kitty Cat Squash!

Kitty Cat Squash an addicting tile merge game! Use the arrows (or arrow keys) to slide the cat tiles on the board and merge the cats! When merged, a new cat appears! You will become addicted trying to beat your highscore, and/or discovering all 16 cats!

Have fun!
